title: Go Programming Method
description: This challenge aims to test the knowledge of the Go programming language's method feature.

meta.title: Go Programming Method: Mastering Struct Methods in Go
meta.description: Explore the power of methods in Go programming language. Learn how to define and use methods to calculate the area and perimeter of a rectangle.
meta.keywords: go playground, area calculation, struct methods, go programming, go, go labs, go playground online, perimeter calculation, go methods, go lab
